home.title: EMECE YAZILIM
home.subtitle: EDUCATION AND CONSULTANCY
home.description: Established in 2024 with the support of Istanbul Medeniyet University Technopark, we aim to produce technological knowledge, develop innovations, improve quality, efficiency, and cost elements, commercialize knowledge, and offer national and international cooperation projects and services by fostering University-Industry collaboration.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1: We offer technology consulting and web applications with innovative and user-friendly mobile solutions designed specifically for you and your company, which will increase your competitive strength in your sector day by day.
aboutUs.description2: In the solutions and applications we offer, we evaluate your business model, brand vision, target audience or user characteristics, and your preferences together. We aim to help you reach the ideal application as a result of these multi-variable development processes.
aboutUs.ourApproachDesc: In all the services we provide, we take into account your brand values, brand goals, user characteristics, and special requests.
aboutUs.ourCommitmentDesc: We enable you to reach ideal and sustainable applications that will ensure success at every stage.
aboutUs.strategicDevelopmentDesc: For the best results, we evaluate feedback on software or applications developed in accordance with the business plan and help you plan new strategies for the future.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer professional solutions that will take your business a step forward in the digital world.

horticulturalTherapy.title: HORTICULTURAL THERAPY APPLICATIONS COURSE
horticulturalTherapy.purpose: This training is prepared to raise awareness about horticultural therapy applications. It aims to show how horticultural therapy applications can be used as a supportive element in health and social care areas.
learningGoals: Participants will learn the philosophy and scientific foundations of horticultural therapy applications.
Participants will learn the physical, mental, and social effects of horticultural therapy applications based on evidence.
Participants will gain program development skills related to horticultural therapy applications.
horticulturalTherapy.targetAudience: Health professionals, social service and care workers, landscape architects, agricultural engineers, and undergraduate and graduate students interested in the subject.

items: Connecting with Nature, Nature-Based Interventions and Health Effects
Definition and History of Horticultural Therapy
Plant Production Techniques in Horticultural Therapy Applications
Program Creation Process in Horticultural Therapy

horticulturalTherapy.methods: Approaches to be used during training: Presentation, Group work, Application examples, Practical training.
horticulturalTherapy.materials: Trainer notes and terrarium design materials.
trainers: Doç. Dr. Hacer GÖK UĞUR, Public Health Nursing
Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Şeyma ŞENGÜR, Landscape Architecture
Prof. Dr. Adnan UĞUR, Garden Plants
Doç. Dr. Diler US ALTAY, Medical Biochemistry
Doç. Dr. Oya Sevcan ORAK, Psychiatric Nursing
Dr. Öğr. Üyesi Ayla HENDEKCİ, Public Health Nursing
Uzman Hemşire Mürselcan KABAKCI, Public Health Nursing
